roleset.name: to sign
roleset.note: AUTOGRAPH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'autograph' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from autograph.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: `` I feel like a little kid , '' says a gleeful Alex de Castro , a car salesman , who has stopped by a workout of the Suns to slip six Campaneris cards to the Great Man Himself [0] [*T*-4]to be autographed [*-30] .
